DatedServiceJourney.Description:
# DatedServiceJourney
>[!NOTE] >A particular ServiceJourney of a vehicle on a particular OperatingDay. > >Operational details of the DatedServiceJourney is derived from a referenced generic ServiceJourney. The generic Journey cannot specify dayTypes when this is defined by the OperatingDay of the DatedServiceJourney.
| XML-type | Name | Type | Cardinality |-|-|-|:-:| | Attribute | Id | ObjectIdType | 1:1| | Attribute | version | | 1:1| | Element | BlockRef | Reference | 0:1| | Element | ServiceJourneyRef | ServiceJourneyRef | 1:1| | List | replacedJourneys | | 0:1| | Element | DatedServiceJourneyRef|DatedServiceJourneyRef| 0:*| | Element | OperatingDayRef|OperatingDayRef| 1:1|
EXAMPLE:
